mapper.select: SELECT pNum, fskName, fseName, fsLifeTime, fsImg_1, fsImg_2, fsGbn, fsClassname, isHerb, s_Month, Season, hName FROM Plants natural join s_When natural join Season natural join Livein natural join Habitat where Plants.pNum = ${no} and s_When.pNum = Plants.pNum and Season.s_Month = s_When.s_Month and Plants.pNum = Livein.pNum and Livein.hid = Habitat.hid

SELECT pNum, fskName, fseName, fsLifeTime, fsImg_1, fsImg_2, fsGbn, fsClassname, isHerb, s_Month, Season, hName FROM Plants natural join s_When natural join Season natural join Livein natural join Habitat WHERE fsGbn="목본류" and s_When.pNum = Plants.pNum and Season.s_Month = s_When.s_Month and Plants.pNum = Livein.pNum and Livein.hid = Habitat.hid

SELECT pNum, fskName, fseName, fsLifeTime, fsImg_1, fsImg_2, fsGbn, fsClassname, isHerb, s_Month, Season, hName FROM Plants natural join s_When natural join Season natural join Livein natural join Habitat WHERE fsGbn="초본류" and s_When.pNum = Plants.pNum and Season.s_Month = s_When.s_Month and Plants.pNum = Livein.pNum and Livein.hid = Habitat.hid
SELECT pNum, fskName, fsImg_1 FROM Plants

SELECT pNum, fskName, fseName, fsLifeTime, fsImg_1, fsImg_2, fsGbn, fsClassname, isHerb, s_Month, Season, hName FROM Plants natural join s_When natural join Season natural join Livein natural join Habitat where s_When.pNum = Plants.pNum and Season.s_Month = s_When.s_Month and Plants.pNum = Livein.pNum and Livein.hid = Habitat.hid ORDER BY pNum
SELECT Plants.pNum, HrbID, HrbName, fsImg_1 FROM Plants, Herb WHERE Herb.pNum=Plants.pNum

select HrbID, HrbName, mng, caution, internal, external, fsImg_1, fsImg_2 from Herb LEFT OUTER join InternalC on Herb.inid=InternalC.inid LEFT OUTER join ExternalC on Herb.exid=ExternalC.exid INNER JOIN Plants ON Plants.pNum=Herb.pNum WHERE HrbId = ${no}
select Herb.HrbID, cName From Country, Cont, Herb where Herb.HrbID = ${no} and Country.cId=Cont.Cid and Herb.HrbID= Cont.HrbID
select Herb.HrbID, DName From DiseaseINF, Therapy, Herb where Herb.HrbID = ${no} and DiseaseINF.Did=Therapy.DID and Herb.HrbID= Therapy.HrbID

SELECT pNum, fskName, fseName, fsLifeTime, fsImg_1, fsImg_2, fsGbn, fsClassname, isHerb, s_Month, Season, hName FROM Plants natural join s_When natural join Season natural join Livein natural join Habitat WHERE fskName Like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') and s_When.pNum = Plants.pNum and Season.s_Month = s_When.s_Month and Plants.pNum = Livein.pNum and Livein.hid = Habitat.hid
select * from DiseaseINF WHERE DName Like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

select Herb.HrbId, HrbName, DName, fsImg_1 from Herb JOIN Therapy on Therapy.HrbID = Herb.HrbID JOIN DiseaseINF on Therapy.DID = DiseaseINF.Did JOIN Plants on Plants.pNum = Herb.pNum Where DiseaseINF.Did in (select Did from DiseaseINF WHERE DName Like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')) ORDER BY DName

SELECT Herb.HrbID, DiseaseINF.Did, HrbName, DiseaseINF.DName, fsImg_1 FROM Herb JOIN Therapy ON Therapy.HrbID=Herb.HrbID JOIN DiseaseINF ON Therapy.DID=DiseaseINF.Did JOIN Plants ON Herb.pNum = Plants.pNum WHERE DiseaseINF.Did in (SELECT DiseaseINF.Did FROM DiseaseINF, Suffer WHERE Suffer.UID=#{UID} and DiseaseINF.Did=Suffer.DID) ORDER BY Herb.HrbID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Suffer WHERE DID = (SELECT Did FROM DiseaseINF WHERE DName=#{DName}) AND UID=#{UID}
